title: I feel like ADCs have no problem with going into other lanes and taking their cs for no reason
body:
.. but then the moment someone touches the cs in their lane the ADC starts screaming and crying and threatening to afk, screaming "GG WE LOSE NO GOLD FOR THE ADC".

Maybe im just circlejerking or overreacting but is it just me?

replies.body:
This stuff triggers me so hard. I was playing zilean mid and the adc kept roaming and taking all the cs and when I told her to please let me have some the response was "You're Zilean".

If riot didn't make adcs the end all be all post 20 min class it wouldn't be as bad. Too much importance on them.

OMEGALUL

The sad truth is nobody wants a useless ADC in a team fight. As much as people hate the class, it is by a large margin, the most important class in the game right now. Although the ADC in your situation was being rude af, it makes sense that Zilean can be useful without CS. His kit can still do what it does without him getting a new item. The slow, the ult (although having AP ratios), the Q stun is largely unaffected by Zilean having more gold. It's a different story when your ADC has more gold and is an item over the enemy ADC cuz their entire kit is based around right clicking. It's sad that team fights are lost simply because your ADC doesn't have lord dominiks but they do. Your ADC doesn't have the IE, Shiv, RFC power spike but they do etc. 

Bottom line: Riot needs to buff other laners to be as important as ADC so they can carry the game in their own ways. Then it wouldn't make sense for an ADC to steal your farm. I mean it's morally wrong and rude to steal farm in the first place, but the META JUSTIFIES IT.

>buff other laners

Please no. Just nerf the ADC class so they come into line with the other classes.

IKR, it feels like adc players feel entitled to steal your farm because they're the strongest class right now and gold is worth more on them than other classes. On one side, it does make sense since it is usually more efficient if your adc gets more gold since they scale harder, on the other, it's just so annoying to get shoved aside by Riot's favorite class.

They were always like that, ever since season 2 if I remember. 

There's nothing to do with how powerful the role is or not, it's a sense of entitlement and selfishness of a man- baby.

You need to consider it.  If the camp has been up for a long time, kill it so that it can respawn at the new current level.  Junglers won't get a single point of bonus xp if the camp had been sitting around a long time generally, because it will be either at or below their level (and the bonus XP ONLY kicks in if they are lower leveled than the camp itself).  Even if you are not going to fully finish off the krugs, killing the original big and medium krug will set it to respawn, and give you half of the gold value of the camp.   You don't have to kill any of the secondary/tertiary spawns, they will despawn on their own after ~10 seconds not in combat or so.

Point of this post: Remind players to not blindly take *all* farm because they're crippling their team. It shows another reason why Shyv+IE is possibly too strong at the moment. It's not hurting anyone but those who behave in the way the OP described, and those it should hurt because they need to adjust their behavior. It helps vent (better here in good fun than in game). It's the community discussing something (even if they all agree on it).

Great post.

No, it isn't. It's a rant thread with a bias against ADCs.

If it was a thread about "Remind[ing] players to not blindly take all farm because they're crippling their team." then it wouldn't be titled "I feel like **ADCs** have no problem with going into other lanes and taking their cs for no reason" and wouldn't have the body, **".. but then the moment someone touches the cs in their lane the ADC starts screaming and crying and threatening to afk, screaming 'GG WE LOSE NO GOLD FOR THE ADC'."**

As much as a good argument that could be, the thread is completely too biased for that to be what the thread is about.
It can be both what the thread is about and that the thread is biased. The argument might not be as good then anymore, but it's still there.
No, because it clearly targets **a specific class** while also exclaiming that other classes *are not able to do this themselves.*

The point is reminding ADCs not to systematically take all farm and starve their team, and the bias is that ADCs are crybabies.

If you want a thread about all classes systematically taking all farm and starving their team, you can make one but it won't be as relevant.
That's discrimination.
That's the reality of the situation.
I dunno if it is just ADCs, I've seen this from laners of all kinds. But yeah it's a thing that some people do.

I dont see it from other laners, i main mid so if my adc is taking my farm i will say nothing and start taking their farm in return.

If they abuse their pings and chat i will mute them. You cannot "declare" two lanes to be yours to farm in.

Usually the toplaner will do the same if the adc is taking their farm.

Its only the ADC i see screaming about "their" farm whilst they are stealing it from other people.

Obviously we play different matches, though, so it could just be happening to you less.
